 Ice stood up and started chatting with the other Maximals. she 
scanned minds as she went trying to identify any threat that might 
occur. All the thoughts were beginning to put thier toll on her. 
listening to thoughts was like straining to hear a conversation in a 
crowded room. 

Lunarpine tried to stay close to Razor Claw but somehow lost him in 
the shuffle. He saw Torca, he knew the face but never got the chance 
to hear the name. Under the coverup of smalltalk the wolfbot tapped 
Torca on the shoulder(stealing a sample from his organic beast 
parts). "We've fought together but I've never known your name." 
Lunarpine knew him from the files he'd seen so names were a small 
thing.
